details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.7 Images - 6.2.7.1 General - Interpolate
details.description: If an Image dictionary contains the Interpolate key, its value shall be false. For an inline image, the I key, if present, shall have a value of false.

rule.description: If an Image dictionary contains the Interpolate key, its value shall be false. For an inline image, the I key, if present, shall have a value of false.

error.message: The value of the Interpolate key in the Image dictionary is true
